result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Archie A Koput

records.addlTxt: Washington County Sheriff's Office Jail Disposition of Prisoners

Clerk: EZ. Defendant Archie A Koput in court.  Attorney Timothy Drewa in court for Archie A Koput.  Prosecuting attorney Mark David Bensen in court for the State of Wisconsin. Guilty plea entered to Count 1. Court dismissed Count 2, Count 3 and Count 4 for read-in.  Court finds def guilty on Count 1 and enters judgment.  Defendant makes statements.

Clerk: EZ. Defendant Archie A Koput in court.  Attorney Timothy Drewa in court for Archie A Koput.  Prosecuting attorney Mark David Bensen in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Counsel requests special date/time for projected plea/sentencing.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 31, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Clerk: EZ. Prosecuting attorney Stephanie L Hanson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Archie A Koput in court.  Attorney Timothy Drewa in court for Archie A Koput.  Court advises on Amended Complaint and finds probable cause on Count 4.  Defendant waives reading of the Information.  Not guilty plea entered to all counts.  Counsel request adjournment for TAD referral.
Hearing scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 09:45 am.

Clerk: EZ. Prosecuting attorney Mandy A. Schepper in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Archie A Koput in court.  Attorney Timothy Drewa in court for Archie A Koput.  Atty. Drewa advises still awaiting blood results.
Hearing scheduled for August 3, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Per phone call from defendant - filed in the wrong case. Not processed.

Clerk: EZ. Prosecuting attorney Mark David Bensen in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Archie A Koput in court.  Attorney Timothy Drewa in court for Archie A Koput.  Atty. Drewa anticipates being appointed and awaiting blood results.  State anticipate blood results in 6-8 weeks from date of violation.  State will adjourn if results are not received and counsel contacts the court.
Hearing scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 09:45 am.
22R 009762 Bond received at Sheriff's Department per Receipt #15165 on 5-11-22
No entry into any premise where primary purpose is sale/consumption of alcohol. Defendant shall maintain absolute sobriety. No driving without a license.

Clerk BMC; Apprs: Prosecuting attorney Mandy A. Schepper in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Archie A Koput in court, in custody.  Attorney Wilfred P. de Junco in court for Archie A Koput. (Def needs hearing assistance). Def given complaint, advised of charges, penalties and rights, and probable cause found. SPD will be appointing any attorney. State requests $850.00 cash bond. Court orders $500.00 cash bond. Not guilty plea entered by Court.
Hearing scheduled for May 18, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
